displayTopicName: Third clause of the Mishnah on Kiddushin 41a

topicTokens.text: Third clause of the Mishnah on Kiddushin 41a

Third clause of the Mishnah on Kiddushin.text: This is the third clause of the Mishnah:

tokens.text: האיש מקדש את בתו כשהיא נערה בו ובשלוחו

Third clause of the Mishnah on Kiddushin.text: It has context, content, and commentary.
